float &  profileStart,
float &  profileDiscrepancy 
) const [protected, pure virtual]

Calculate longitudinal shower profile for a cluster and compare it with the expected profile for a photon.

Parameters:

profileStart to receive the profile start, in radiation lengths
profileDiscrepancy to receive the profile discrepancy

void pandora::ShowerProfileCalculator::ReadSettings ( const TiXmlHandle *const   pXmlHandle  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Read shower profile calculator settings from xml.

This function will receive a callback if the top level xml tags <ShowerProfileCalculator></ShowerProfileCalculator> are present.

Parameters:
pXmlHandle address of the relevant xml handle

Reimplemented in FineGranularityShowerProfileCalculator.
